name: 1 Dribble invite - Valid till 4th April 2022
description:
Hello! everyone, hope you're all doing marvellously well.


Today, I have got one invite to give away. Please note that this invite is valid till the 4th of April 2022


Send your dribble your portfolio links to this email address: lodnael@gmail.com

Subject line: dribbble invite 2022


Info: Write few sentence about you and why you want the Invite (Optional)

Portfolio: Attach a link to your dribbble or Figma profile (Required) You could also, attach same information in the comment section of this post, please be patient, I'll review all the applications and announce the winner as soon as I can. Good Luck to everyone. 

_________


PS. If you've seen the NOWNESS Mini project I shared, Stay tuned, I have some interesting similar projects down the pipeline I'll be sharing on dribble. 


EDIT: I later called it "The Boomerang Projects" or Project Boomerang :)


Duplicate, Enjoy!

https://dribbble.com/shots/17361523-Design-Masterclass-Case-study-NOWNESS


I'm planing to build a community here on ko-fi as well, feel free to join, become part of the journey  https://ko-fi.com/natte


Stay Happy!
